name: Nishchal Kumar Singh
label: Aspiring Software Developer & ML Enthusiast
summary: I am a B.Tech student at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad with a strong foundation in programming, machine learning, and open-source development. I actively participate in competitive programming and hackathons, and I'm passionate about AI, algorithms, and solving real-world problems through technology.

projects.title: Machine Learning Library from Scratch
projects.summary: Implemented core ML algorithms from scratch, enhancing my understanding of data science foundations.
highlights: Built Linear & Logistic Regression, KNN, Decision Trees, K-Means, and N-layer Neural Networks
Used only NumPy for implementation, no high-level ML libraries
Tested and documented on Google Colab for reproducibility

projects.title: SmartMail - RAG-Powered Email Assistant
projects.summary: Automated email responses using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
highlights: Built using Python and LLM integration
Extracts context from email chains and responds smartly

degrees: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering

education.institution: SR DAV Public School, Pundag, Ranchi

interests.name: Photography
interests.summary: I am deeply interested in photography and capturing the beauty of the world through my lens.

interests.name: Competitive Programming
interests.summary: Regularly participate in LeetCode, Codeforces, and CodeChef contests to sharpen problem-solving skills.
